duties_responsibilities.duty: Supporting Store Manager and Assistant Store Manager in achieving retail store targets by driving sales.
Overseeing store opening and closing, ensuring safety and legal compliance.
Delivering sales through friendly and efficient customer service, ensuring an enjoyable shopping experience for customers.
Demonstrating and explaining Claire's products to customers.
Assisting in store operations such as processing deliveries, visual merchandising, stock takes, markdowns, and promotions.
Performing ear piercing after receiving full training.
Ensuring the store looks presentable and inviting to customers.
